# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. S/A MARTIN WILL BE MET ON HIS ARRIVAL IN BOLIVIA
ON TUESDAY, MAY 14, 1974, VIA BN #979 AT 1:30 P.M.
NECESSARY APPOINTMENTS WITH THE COMPETENT BOLIVIAN OFFICIALS
WILL BE MADE.


2. RESERVATIONS HAVE BEEN MADE. IF ANY CHANGES ARE
NECESSARY, YOU WILL BE IMMEDIATELY ADVISED.


BEDOLLA, SAIC.
STEDMAN
